title: Problems of philosophy (TEFC): is mind identical with brain?
creator_credit: Mary Hoskins, Open University and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Professor Charles Taylor from McGill University, Montreal, challenges Anthony Quinton from New College, Oxford, to defend his views that mental events are identical with brain processes.
